research_question: At R=2.0A (dissociation limit), the state is heavily entangled (alpha=-1.13). Z0/Z1 expectation values approach 0 while X0X1/Y0Y1 dominate. Can hardware resolve the small energy differences in this flat region of the PES?
description: VQE H2 at R=2.0A on qubits [2,4]. Near-dissociation regime. The hardest test: small energy gaps, large entanglement, high sensitivity to X/Y basis noise.
